name: Wartortle
flavorText: Its tail is large and covered with a rich, thick fur. The tail becomes increasingly deeper in color as Wartortle ages. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon’s toughness as a battler.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
abilities.shortEffect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.flavorText: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.effect: With Grass Pledgegrass-pledge, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.

moves.name: Scald
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.flavorText: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Fling
moves.effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

moves.name: Surf
moves.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.flavorText: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Submission
moves.flavorText: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Counter
moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Strength
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Dig
moves.flavorText: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
moves.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Rage
moves.flavorText: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
moves.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
moves.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

moves.name: Bide
moves.flavorText: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
moves.effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.flavorText: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.effect: With Grass Pledgegrass-pledge, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Scald
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Dive
moves.effect: User dives underwater, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.flavorText: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Fling
moves.effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

moves.name: Surf
moves.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Counter
moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Strength
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Dig
moves.flavorText: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
moves.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.flavorText: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
moves.effect: Raises user's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Dive
moves.effect: User dives underwater, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Snore
moves.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.flavorText: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.flavorText: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
moves.effect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Strength
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Dig
moves.flavorText: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
moves.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Confide
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.flavorText: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.flavorText: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.flavorText: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Blastoise
flavorText: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell. The water spouts are very accurate. They can shoot bullets of water with enough accuracy to strike empty cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
abilities.shortEffect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Confide
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.flavorText: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.effect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.effect: With Grass Pledgegrass-pledge, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.

moves.name: Scald
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.flavorText: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Surf
moves.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.flavorText: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Submission
moves.flavorText: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Counter
moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Strength
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.flavorText: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.flavorText: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
moves.effect: Causes a one-hit KO.

moves.name: Dig
moves.flavorText: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
moves.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Rage
moves.flavorText: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
moves.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.effect: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
moves.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

moves.name: Bide
moves.flavorText: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
moves.effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Focus Blast
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.flavorText: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Submission
moves.flavorText: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Counter
moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Strength
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.flavorText: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.flavorText: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
moves.effect: Causes a one-hit KO.

moves.name: Dig
moves.flavorText: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
moves.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Rage
moves.flavorText: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
moves.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
moves.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

moves.name: Bide
moves.flavorText: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
moves.effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.flavorText: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Roar
moves.flavorText: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Surf
moves.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.flavorText: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.flavorText: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
moves.effect: Raises user's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Snore

moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Curse

moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Surf
moves.flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Counter
moves.flavorText: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.
moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Strength
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.flavorText: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

moves.name: Dig
moves.flavorText: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.
moves.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.flavorText: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
moves.effect: Raises user's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.flavorText: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Snore
moves.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.flavorText: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.flavorText: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
moves.effect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Dive
moves.effect: User dives underwater, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.flavorText: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.flavorText: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

moves.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.flavorText: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.flavorText: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
moves.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.flavorText: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
moves.effect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.flavorText: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Hail
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Dive
moves.effect: User dives underwater, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

moves.name: Hydro Cannon
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

moves.flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.effect: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

name: Caterpie
flavorText: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.flavorText: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder-shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder-wave's is not, nor are knock-off's item removal and air-cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

moves.name: Snore
moves.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.flavorText: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

name: Butterfree
flavorText: Its wings are covered in toxic scales. If it finds bird Pokémon going after Caterpie, Butterfree sprinkles its scales on them to drive them off.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.
abilities.shortEffect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.
effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.
This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn-drill, and sheer-cold).
Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.flavorText: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
abilities.shortEffect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.
effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.effect: User must switch out after attacking.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Confide
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.effect: Has double power if the user has no held item.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.effect: User must switch out after attacking.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.flavorText: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Rage
moves.flavorText: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
moves.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.flavorText: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  No effect otherwise.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
moves.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

moves.name: Bide
moves.flavorText: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
moves.effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

moves.name: Swift
moves.flavorText: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.
moves.effect: Inflicts damage between 50% and 150% of the user's level.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Roost
moves.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.effect: Discards the user's stat changes and copies the target's.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Thief
moves.flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
moves.effect: Takes the target's item.

moves.name: Snore
moves.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.effect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Skill Swap
moves.effect: User and target swap abilities.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.flavorText: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
moves.effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.flavorText: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Thief
moves.flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
moves.effect: Takes the target's item.

moves.name: Snore
moves.flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Endure
moves.flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.effect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.name: Twister
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.effect: Discards the user's stat changes and copies the target's.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Skill Swap
moves.effect: User and target swap abilities.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

moves.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

name: Weedle
flavorText: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.flavorText: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shortEffect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
effect: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder-shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder-wave's is not, nor are knock-off's item removal and air-cutter's increased critical hit rate.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.flavorText: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.shortEffect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
effect: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

name: Beedrill
flavorText: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.flavorText: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.flavorText: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.
abilities.shortEffect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.
effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

moves.name: Infestation
moves.effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

moves.name: Confide
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.effect: Has double power if the user has no held item.

moves.name: Round
moves.effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Rage
moves.flavorText: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
moves.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
moves.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Bide
moves.flavorText: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
moves.effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

moves.name: Swift
moves.flavorText: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
moves.effect: Never misses.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.flavorText: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.

moves.name: Cut
moves.flavorText: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Payback
moves.effect: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.flavorText: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.flavorText: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.effect: User must switch out after attacking.

moves.name: Roost
moves.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

moves.name: Attract

moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.flavorText: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
moves.effect: Copies the target's last used move.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Thief
moves.flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
moves.effect: Takes the target's item.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.flavorText: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.flavorText: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
moves.effect: Cannot lower the target's HP below 1.

moves.effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.flavorText: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.flavorText: Uses an own move randomly while asleep.
moves.effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: Attract
moves.flavorText: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
moves.effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.
moves.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
moves.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.flavorText: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
moves.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
moves.effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.flavorText: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
moves.effect: Cannot lower the target's HP below 1.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
moves.effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
moves.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.flavorText: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Flash
moves.flavorText: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target’s accuracy.
moves.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

moves.name: Rest
moves.flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
moves.effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.flavorText: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.
moves.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: Thief
moves.flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
moves.effect: Takes the target's item.

moves.name: Protect
moves.flavorText: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
moves.effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
